        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="62036" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="62036" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.76</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="10006">10,006</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1061"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>My Way</b> by <b>Giorgio Armani</b> is a Floral fragrance for women. <b>My Way</b> was launched in 2020. My Way was created by Carlos Benaïm and Bruno Jovanovic. Top notes are Orange Blossom and Bergamot; middle notes are Tuberose and Indian Jasmine; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, White Musk and Virginian Cedar. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html" target="_blank" </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="62036"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.16.jpg" style="width: 4.175rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orange-Blossom-16.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Orange Blossom</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94222822930411; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 3.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.25.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tuberose-25.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tuberose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 4.075rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Indian Jasmine</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90318300578584; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 3.325rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Madagascar Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.88196601125011; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 3.2rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>White Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Virginian Cedar</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="62036"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='cf0b16ffd38d3c03a9821746dde7fe9c871' slotpayload='{"ct":"GxDG5LYTDD6ESHYJ8Y6WUq63Q64fkoWpkzQO18fGTxZ6kF9dyE7yUJ64Kx40sLjFXZpJrqib3KSiEzZZtobsh1Yrxm8yOcyv2kd+kl8lJhwRxqBvRB8OxCt9WyAlOzDgXWMMAKGhRcHUPpmgv4Xihs16IQiONEfIh0lIEcgGk5Hfy4OHHGCvEKxJBs56W+Kmq6tPK9PZJaylreJsfR\/X2mKDYAyEwdbRqkMgxXvUygfGokytdtCkWldsHPFce1wYVrEoLXhq6N2k2FdFNljObFHaPc6eX9uIzx+i7uc+j\/1cM5imIx9QHWhK3CAhSYHG","iv":"a22382f8133a203ed83ee2b116c0e20b","s":"110bcb9b9c5a225f"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

Considering who they chose to be the face and spokesperson for this fragrance, it's not shocking this is a cheap tacky perfume and clearly a desperate attempt to be a money grab. <br />
<br />
Somehow it smells like a child perfume and an old lady perfume all at once? Definitely don't wear this with a leather jacket or if someone around you smokes anything, it gets even more disgusting if you do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />

It has its place.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2343093"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2343093#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341725" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Feminine. Beautiful. Safe.<br />
<br />

This is one of them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2341725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2341725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I am not a huge tuberose fan though- it's one of my least favorite scents so it makes sense why I didn't like this. not complex or alluring at all. linear; boring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340942" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Belle.tf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2287500"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2287500.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Belle.tf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-43297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain"title="Mon Guerlain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340942ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340942" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2287500">Belle.tf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 10:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>About 10 years ago I used L’Oréal Casting Creme gloss hair dye and it came with a conditioner that had the exact same scent! <br />
<br />
Crazy that I tried My Way today and instantly reminded me of that product. I remember used to loving that conditioner even wrote to L’Oréal to find out if they sold it separately too, because it was amazing and I loved the smell. So yes I think it smells amazing, i just wish it was less sweet.. the sweetness reminds me of Flowerbomb, maybe i should try another flanker but not the intense one because that one is too much orange blossom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2340942"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2340942#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339702" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339702" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MalibuMermaid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757701.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MalibuMermaid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Mademoiselle-611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Mademoiselle"title="Coco Mademoiselle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339702ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339702" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757701">MalibuMermaid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 05:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A generic, safe, white floral with lots of projection. Very feminine and pretty, sunny daytime fresh, great for spring time. Think picnic in a dress among wildflowers. <br />
<br />
If you’re into those very polarizing deep, heady and sensual white floral notes like I am, this won’t fit that bill. My Way is a nice way to wear white florals safely without offending anyone and to just feel universally pretty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2339702"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2339702#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I work at a grocery store, and an older lady was walking around wearing this. I could smell her all over the store and had to track her down to ask what she was wearing. Another customer also stopped her and asked her to write it down. It’s beautiful sweet vanilla white floral. I don’t think it has any age limit to it. I’ve never been into sweet or vanillic scents, but this has changed my mind</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2339096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2339096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2161286">makinmagic1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 16:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tuberose for women who don't like tuberose. Overly, unnaturally sweet. And of course, what modern popular perfume would it be without the Kirke style synthetic musk overload?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2332924"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2332924#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326699" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ejayne64"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ejayne64" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067">ejayne64</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 18:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm a tuberose lover, so naturally sampled this, but it is too bubblegummy and headache inducing for me personally. Almost as if a perfume was shouting at me...loud? I can see the appeal, but after smelling Rouge Malachite from their private line, which I cannot get out of my head (so well blended, triple tuberose, beautiful), this one is just underwhelming from Armani even despite the much lesser price point. 6/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2326699"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2326699#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323744" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dormegatto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2239778"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2239778.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dormegatto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2239778">dormegatto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 07:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>its not as pleasant as I thought it would be. I have had it for almost half a year and I do not reach for it as much as my other giorgio armani perfumes. Maybe it is because florals do not smell well on me since it changes to an almost pungent scent after I have worn it on a hot day. I personally wear it on a cold day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2323744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2323744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321517" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chloefrag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2290393"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chloefrag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2290393">chloefrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it’s definitely jasmine tea. the tea scent is really prominent. light, sweet, and bright. it reminds me on a sunny day, windy breeze, sipping a cold ice jasmine tea. a nice scent to change the vibes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2321517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2321517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319345" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cather0ine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244342"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2244342.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cather0ine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319345ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319345" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244342">cather0ine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 21:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I smell this, I imagine stirring hot jasmine tea with a stick of rock candy. There’s a hint of grape bubblegum. A citrus peel bite. It’s shampooey, indolic, and creamy. Tuberose gorgeousness, musk perfected. The cedar note was a genius move. I’m very infatuated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2319345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2319345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318865" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LibbyLouLee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1667366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LibbyLouLee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Confessions-of-A-Rebel/Get-A-Room-Order-Champagne-82500.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82500.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Get A Room & Order Champagne"title="Get A Room & Order Champagne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318865ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318865" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1667366">LibbyLouLee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SWEET KITTY LITTER! This is a sweet, cloying fragrance. The dry down is better, but that opening is intense. I was going to say it's a "younger person" fragrance, but my 13-year-old described MY WAY as smelling like sweet, kitty litter. And, when she said that, that is all I can smell now. <br />
Try before you buy! Performance and projection is good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2318865"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2318865#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318726" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JuliaToothFairy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JuliaToothFairy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472">JuliaToothFairy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's not groundbreaking or unique, but it is a good reminder that not everything needs to be complex. It's a basic perfume, but a pleasant one.<br />
Forget the notes, it doesn't smell only of white flowers. It actually smells fruity. Reading the comments, I see everyone is getting a different fruit.<br />
To me, it smells like a fruit punch, fruity and just a bit sweet. I can also get why some describe it as a strawberry champagne scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2318726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2318726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316036" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="arielina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2048621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2048621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="arielina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2048621">arielina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 22:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is truly no fragrance close enough to My Way. I distinctly remember my first time smelling it and immediately buying it with a smile on my face. (When was the last time you felt this way buying a fragrance?) The jasmine reminds me of jasmine honey boba tea. The tuberose is playful and rounded out by the vanilla note, creating a sweet experience all around. My Way was my signature fragrance during the entirety of 2021. I did not use a single other fragrance. I eventually got sick of the explosion of sweetness, but as I write this love letter to My Way, I can't help but feel that eagerness to reach for her again. The woman that wears My Way is both adventurous and reliable, sweet yet unpredictable. Her smile charms you. She is your first love, and you'll always find your way back to her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2316036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2316036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314147" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2304945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2304945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's the smell that you wanting to have more and more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2304348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2304348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303821" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kennedim1022"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1960120"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1960120.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kennedim1022" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-Exclusif-50370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina Exclusif"title="Delina Exclusif"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1960120">kennedim1022</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was not expecting to love this nearly as much as I do. Perhaps one of my new favorite designer fragrances (right behind Donna Born In Roma which is quite different as well).  It’s such a feminine and sweet scent that for some reason reminds me of water? like a waterpark or beach, something aquatic. Very much a daytime summer scent, but would really work well in any season. I got a small sample from Sephora and my boyfriend and I both became a bit addicted, so I had to naturally buy the full bottle lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2303821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2303821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301324" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mammumetsas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2272740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2272740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mammumetsas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zadig-Voltaire/This-Is-Her-Undressed-78743.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78743.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="This Is Her! padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295996" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BrittanyXO_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264285"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1264285.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BrittanyXO_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264285">BrittanyXO_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 13:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is as described a ''classic floral''. If you are not into floral fragrances or trying to find THE floral that will make you change your mind, I would not recommend to buy this. It does smell nice, fresh, and like sweet white flowers -- great for spring/summer daytime, if this is your thing, you will love this -- if you are trying to be surprised by a floral scent, look elsewhere. I personally thought it was not unique at all, but a it remains a beautiful safe scent for the classic floral lovers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2295996"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2295996#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295068" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="clarkanian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266723"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2266723.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="clarkanian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266723">clarkanian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 16:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>EXTREMELY sweet scent, almost sickeningly so. I use it sparingly in the spring and summer. The scent is lovely once it fades a bit; it's just a bit heavy, so if you're not a fan of super sweet scents, maybe stay away from this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2295068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2295068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293994" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AubreyNoel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2232554"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AubreyNoel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-9677.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9677.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty"title="Gucci Guilty"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2232554">AubreyNoel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 15:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have read multiple reviews stating that this fragrance was both sweet and generic, and yes both of those are true, but personally I really enjoyed this. As someone who gravitates towards sweet fragrances, this is about as sweet as I think I am willing to go. But it smells fantastic, probably because of the jasmine and orange blossom combo (which is a favorite of mine). I agree with the comparisons to Prada Paradoxe, so if you are looking for a stronger version of that without the moss notes featured in Paradoxe Intense then this would be a good choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2293994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2293994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290240" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfumeistherapy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2261714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfumeistherapy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2261714">Perfumeistherapy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this scent! It is a strong scent, and lingers forever on clothing. If you love Jasmine and Vanilla, this is a divine combination. It feels floral without the sharpness, more like a creamy floral.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2290240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2290240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286860" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2274342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2274342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274314" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vampiric"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2232837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2232837.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vampiric" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2232837">Vampiric</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 00:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me it does not smell as sweet as some seem to experience it. Citrus, white floral, some mild wood undertones, and something a bit herbal. As someone who usually doesn't go for fresh citrus scents, this is on the fresher side while still being a clear impact full scent. So if you are someone who usually goes for more heavy feminine scents, this might be good if you wanna tip your toes in. I think it's quite versatile actually, in my opinion it works both day and night. My only critics is that it might be a bit to generic for some. It also has a bit of that cleaning product vibe, but it's not to extreme and a very common thing for this type of scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2274314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2274314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273875" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273875" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emiliaaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2091307.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emiliaaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273875ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273875" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091307">Emiliaaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like flowers + strawberry champagne 🍓<br />
Long lasting 🌟<br />
Perfect for any weather 🌸</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2273875"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2273875#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; the flowers are blooming and the fruits are ripe. sure, she’s a little immature and girlish, but what’s so wrong with that? this fragrance reminds me of simpler times. she’s a staple in my collection, and i love her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266302" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rootbeerdumdums"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234520"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2234520.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rootbeerdumdums" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266302ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266302" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234520">rootbeerdumdums</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 16:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It stuns me that neroli is not listed as one of the notes of this perfume, since that and tuberose is all I get from My Way. It’s a floral scent, yes, but offers so much more bite than that. It’s a little peppery at first sniff, and I do get some of the bubblegum that I know others have mentioned. I normally dislike florals and extremely feminine perfumes and this has managed to become one of my favorites nonetheless. This is what Regina George wears. This is not a Barbie perfume; it’s definitely Bratz-leaning!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2266302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2266302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301316">Maddiemayhem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 20:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If anyone wants a very affordable dupe to this this smells almost identical to Paris Hilton tease to my nose. I really wanted to like this but I just can’t, peppery almost tuberose that makes me a little bit nauseous. Instantly reminded me of the Paris Hilton perfume and unfortunately was a scrubber for me since tuberose fragrances are usually a hit or miss to my nose. I don’t get the comparison to l’interdit as that fragrance has more of a grape-bubblegum tuberose and i enjoy that scent way more. I also own Prada paradoxe and don’t get the comparison at all either, to me paradoxe is way  fruitier</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2265352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2265352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/440358">valevaleria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 15:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am annoyed that it came so popular that I do not want to wear it anymore. However, it is a really good fragrance. Had to grow on me. The first time I tried it, I could just smell a sweet vanilla. Gave it another try on cool weather and after liking Zara's dupe (which by the way is a very good cheaper option) and I really liked it. It is all about tuberouse. Balanced and sweet. I enjoy it during cold seasons, since it gets a little cloying on Hot days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2260838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2260838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256068" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lauren387"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1794391"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lauren387" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Eau-de-Parfum-176.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.176.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Eau de Parfum"title="Allure Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1794391">Lauren387</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 05:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this fragrance and it stayed in my closet untouched for about a year after initially trying it. Recently, when inventorying my collection, I came across it again, and have grown to love. On my skin and to my nose, I get creamy, slightly indolic white florals. Fresh spring-like Blooming jasmine and tuberose. Tuberose is more green than bubblegum on me. I also have the Intense version but is my favorite bc it’s more heady and green.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2256068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2256068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250527" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250527" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="s0ph1e"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2222957"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="s0ph1e" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250527ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250527" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2222957">s0ph1e</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 14:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love at first smell! This is slightly citrusy, slightly green, musky and very floral, especially tuberose heavy. I don't get a lot of jasmine or orange blossom, probably because of the strong tuberose, but I personally don't mind it. Though, I can definitely understand why people may not like it, because of the very bubblegum-like scent. People have sad grape which I disagree with. Very girly and youthful perfume and lasts for a moderate amount of time. Perfect for springtime and wear during the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2250527"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2250527#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249393" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumepearl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792886"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumepearl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/OUAI/Melrose-Place-52552.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52552.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melrose Place"title="Melrose Place"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249393ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249393" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); Works for everyone, everywhere. Reminds me of my dearest friend, so this reminds me of her. Such a beautiful persona, with a sparkling beautiful scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2249393"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2249393#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Dry down reminds me of wild strawberries.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2248864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2248864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239775" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I agree with you that most bad comments should not be downvoted<br />
In fact I am for leaving only upvoting and Report button for the comments<br />
But some things are obviously spam &amp; insults <br />

But nevertheless labeling smth as "funeral flower scent" means that you are propagating your own negative experience on the perfume which in its turn may have the opposite effect for others.<br />
