padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233406" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Abeer Alatrash"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2134624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Abeer Alatrash" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134624">Abeer Alatrash</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 01:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Comfortable pure mature fragrance of white florals with clean sweety base. One of the most beautiful perfumes I have smell ever of Tuberose and Jasmine ingrediants. <br />
<br />
This perfume suitable for any time and any season, for occasions and for your wedding in my opinion after shower, during the day or at night. It lasts 12 hours or more on the leather and one day on the clothes.<br />
<br />
I adore this feeling of feminine, elegance and angelic of this perfume. I feel that this perfume seems like the mother of "Gucci Bloom". I put it to my wish list perfumes of me in the future.<br />
<br />
عطر مريح نقي ناضج من الأزهار البيضاء مع قاعدة حلوة نظيفة. من أجمل العطور التي شممتها على الإطلاق والتي مكوناتها المهيمنة من مسك الروم والياسمين.<br />
<br />
 برأيي هذا العطر مناسب لأي وقت وأي موسم، للمناسبات وحفلة زفافك بعد الاستحمام، أثناء النهار أو في الليل. يدوم 12 ساعة أو أكثر على الجلد ويوم واحد على الملابس.<br />
<br />
  لـ أنا أعشق هذا الشعور بالأنوثة والأناقة والملائكية لهذا العطر. أشعر أن هذا العطر يبدو وكأنه الأم "Gucci Bloom". أضعه في قائمة العطور التي أتمنى أن أحصل عليها في المستقبل.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2233406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2233406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233250" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="XOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537710"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1537710.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="XOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233250ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233250" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537710">XOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOXOX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 20:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bubblegum₊˚⊹♡ is the first thing that pops into my mind when I smell this perfume. That rush of sweetness followed by soft white florals really makes this fragrance a fun everyday scent for me. That tuberose and Indian jasmine with musk definitely rounds out this fragrance. <br />
<br />
Moderate lasting on my skin, so it's wonderful for daytime♡</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2233250"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2233250#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233143" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kiwigoddess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523875"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1523875.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kiwigoddess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523875">Kiwigoddess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 17:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In this fragrance I get wafts of Black Opium, Libre, Valentino Donna, and La Vie Est Belle. Sometimes it smells of those stronger notes of the first two above mentioned fragrances and sometimes the more delicate sweeter notes of the latter two fragrances. This isn't quite a love for me but is stronger than a like. I'm feeling very conflicted as whether to buy a full bottle of this. As you can see from perfumes I listed, it feels very much like an "opposites" thing, like angel/devil, naughty/nice. The notes giving it a Black Opium and Libre similarity would be the naughty devil, playful, somewhat mysterious and definitely mischievious side.  Donna and LVEB would be the nice, angelic, feminine, well-behaved side. This fragrance lasted for about 9-10 hours on me but did sit close to the skin for the last 3-4 hours. Projection was about arms' length with small sillage (first couple of hours the sillage would have been maybe 1-2 metres). Although this leans more fem, I think certain guys who like this type of scent could also probably pull this off. I don't think it's a safe blind buy because it does come off with a strong, almost licorice note so for that reason I would suggest getting a decant or trying instore first. <br />
<br />
The woman wearing this might start off as a slightly more reserved angel but she could quickly become a "Super Freak". 🤭🤭</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2233143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2233143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227142" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227142" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ke3ke3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ke3ke3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Iris-Malikhan-62617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Malikhân"title="Iris Malikhân"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227142ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227142" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926">ke3ke3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a tuberose lover, but to my nose, this fragrance is quite generic. It's not offensive, but it just smells like a BBW candle (to my nose). Anywho, I would choose Love Tuberose by Amouage any day over My Way! I do not follow the bubblegum comparison (perhaps I'm taking it too literally?), but I am getting a very creamy, even buttery, white floral.<br />
<br />
EDIT: the more I smell this, the more I dislike it... so much so that I am going to attempt to wash it off. Something about it just bothers me... not a fan, though I typically do love white florals!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2227142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2227142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221359" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xsxcstarx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/57305"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.57305.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xsxcstarx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rihanna/Reb-l-Fleur-10554.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10554.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reb'l Fleur"title="Reb'l Fleur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/57305">xsxcstarx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is not something I would normally wear but after seeing other reviews saying about the bubblegum i had to give the tester a go &amp; im glad i did! <br />
<br />
This is a fresh, clean perfume. Its heavy on the white florals throughout but the bubblegum note is there &amp; thats what makes me really like this. Its a pleasent perfume which lasts for a long time, its an easy to wear fragrance &amp; reminds me of being on holiday<br />
<br />
I also love the bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2221359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2221359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Perfume floral con larga duración, más de 8 horas, y mucha proyección. Se despliega como un ramo de flores blancas intensas. En su secado tiene una fijación dulce, pero no empalagosa. Es versátil, aunque pueda resultar demasiado intenso para algunas personas. No resulta una fragancia original, pero agradable para la mayoría. Es un aroma que viste y te hace sentir segura.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2217566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2217566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217245" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; At the beginning it's pleasant but with the time it gets more and more nauseating.<br />
<br />
Edit: I decided to try this perfume during the colder days and I was surprised because I smell a delicate floral. The weather is important when using certain types of perfume and for me this is a perfume for cooler days, I can't wear it during the summer/heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201522" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="francisca490@gmail.com"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="francisca490@gmail.com" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201522ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201522" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179235"><a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="8bedf9eae5e8e2f8e8eabfb2bbcbece6eae2e7a5e8e4e6">[email&#160;protected]</a></b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-27">06/27/24 18:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Actualmente lo tengo. <br />
Me declaro fans de su aroma, e incluso entre este y le parfum, me quedo con esta versión. Su aroma es mucho mas femenino y floral, se distingue mejor su esencia y dura  mucho en piel y ropa.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2201522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2201522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2200721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2200721" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sarahyacinth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2163331.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sarahyacinth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Shahd-92446.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92446.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shahd"title="Shahd"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2200721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2200721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2200721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2200721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197041" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Juleigh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2017834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Juleigh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Alhambra/Kismet-Angel-79015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kismet Angel"title="Kismet Angel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197041ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197041" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017834">Juleigh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of the 80s fragrances we all wore in high school. White Shoulders, Sand &amp; Sable, Design etc, mixed in with spray on sunscreen.<br />
<br />
It's OK. It's what I think high school/college girls - now, would call an "old lady" scent. <br />
<br />
The tuberose was prevalent in the 80s. All of us 80s babes are grandma's now! That constitutes old lady! Lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2197041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2197041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192471" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="misssamantha017"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137981"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2137981.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="misssamantha017" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137981">misssamantha017</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 17:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy the opening - it starts out light and sweet (I tend to enjoy orange blossom combined with vanilla in fragrances) but then slowly progresses to that bubble-gummy white floral that becomes too sweet for my taste. It's soft so I feel it's not super headache inducing but it definitely projects. It reminds me of a few different things: 1) Viktor &amp; Rolf Flowerbomb but add bubblegum and 2) a more grown up, softer version of Snow Fairy from Lush. I think this would be good for maybe a girl in her late teens/early 20's who wants something more grown up but still sweeter and appropriate for someone younger. It's an interesting fragrance where I feel it's definitely more mature smelling (I don't pick up citrus or anything bright) yet someone younger could wear it. I could see why this is popular but it's not my personal taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2192471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2192471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2191226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2191226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187727" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187727" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jeannebelmondo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/952157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.952157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jeannebelmondo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Tea-Escape-30261.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30261.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tea Escape"title="Tea Escape"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187727ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187727" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/952157">jeannebelmondo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 01:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@toosimilar:<br />
Hi, having an association with a certain flower or note and writing it down isn't 'cruel' to do, it is just writing what it reminds me of, from my memories, my experiences. It's not as if one insults the fans of any perfume by saying what it reminds one of; in fact I like this fragrance too.<br />
<br />
Sometimes I feel like Fragrantica's perfume pages can get in the habit of downvoting anything and going into defense mode for anything that isn't unanimous praise for that perfume, but are review pages here meant to solely be shrines for those of us who already love the scent or are they not also supposed to be a range of opinions for those who might have different taste too? How can this site be helpful for those who haven't sampled a perfume if it's only fans of the perfume upvoting each other en masse and discouraging anything else?<br />
<br />
I respect your opinion, and you can still respect mine, because it's definitely not 'cruel'.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2187727"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2187727#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187132" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187132" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zjes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1737223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1737223.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zjes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1737223">zjes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 11:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have seen a lot of people mention that this perfume is too "generic" or "basic", but honestly i do not see anything wrong with a perfume being simple and pleasing to the majority of the population. Not all perfumes need to be groundbreaking, simple is good too! This perfume is very crowd-pleasing with a great performance when it comes to both longevity and sillage. The scent can be smelled from a far even after 10 hours with just 2-3 sprays. If you are looking for a staple piece in your collection, then My Way is a great option &lt;3<br />
<br />
The mix floral and vanilla makes this the perfect blend of sweet and white floral, and in my opinion it's hard to go wrong with My Way. This perfume also works well in all occasions; cold or warm, day or night. :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2187132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2187132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My new signature! Not sure about the flankers I’m gonna stick the OG 😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2179657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2179657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177360" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164543" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cupidrot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610720"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1610720.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cupidrot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610720">cupidrot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 14:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried this because I had read this was a good office scent... the vibe for me is more elementary school nurse's office. Sprayed myself with this to test and felt like I had doused myself with cough syrup... I think maybe I am not a fan of tuberose. I have to go ahead and second the review below me that compares this to scented markers, it smells shockingly synthetic in a very stationery way. Scratch and sniff stickers but intensified. It's a shame, because with a name like "my way" I was hoping for a more elegant and dominant office fragrance to channel confidence in the workplace, but it's not a boss bitch scent in the slightest. Sorry to be so disparaging because this is surely a popular choice, but it's sooo not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2164543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2164543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134856">cawico7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 13:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very safe and pleasing, sweet-ish white floral bouquet. <br />
My problem with it? It smells just enough like those scented pens and notebooks back in the 2000s that I can't get the association out of my head. It's nothing like that if you don't think about it, but once you do, it's hard to get rid of. I hope someone knows what I'm talking about.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2148701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2148701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145168" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="icerise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001214.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="icerise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214">icerise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 01:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first smelled this while flipping through a fashion magazine, and I couldn’t wait to get my hands on it.  I bought the travel size while waiting for the 50ml, and when I tried it in isolation (not in a perfume store), the floral notes really dominated and harassed my nose.  I got an instant headache.  I can’t even tell you which note was which because I returned the 50ml and would only spray on the travel size once in a blue moon as MY WAY of not giving up on the perfume.  Sadly, it continues to disappoint, and I don’t get complimented on it—it’s probably loud and attention-grabbing on me.  Beautiful bottle, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2145168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2145168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2143300" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mzhyde"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1967130"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1967130.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mzhyde" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Crystal-Noir-Eau-de-Toilette-67502.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67502.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Crystal Noir Eau de Toilette"title="Crystal Noir Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2143300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2143300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1967130">mzhyde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-02">05/02/24 08:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells very heavy and floral on me. I hate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2143300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2143300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LeilaniYamada"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2109114"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2109114.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LeilaniYamada" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-Desire-17124.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17124.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One Desire"title="The One Desire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2109114">LeilaniYamada</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft, classy, beautiful white floral. I don't find it all that 'bubble-gummy' of a tuberose; to me, it's light and a little sharp and doesn't have that fruity, lush indolence of a true heavy tuberose (the intense version has that feel). Yes, it's a bit generic because it's not very complex, but it's an easy and pleasant everyday wear fragrance. I wore it daily during a week-long beach vacation with my toddler-aged nieces and a brother whose nose is very easily offended, and they all thought it was nice. Worth getting for your collection if you don't already have a similar, easy-to-wear light floral scent you enjoy for spring and summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2138214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2138214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; After only a few minutes the Indian jasmine makes its way in, Iykyk… unfortunately this gives a fecal note causing the dry down to be what I could only describe as trying to cover the stink of a portapotty with Lysol floral air freshener.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Unfortunately, this fragrance doesn't sit well with me. Its bold, white floral notes are overwhelming and don't align with my personal taste or chemistry, often causing headaches.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2133712"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2133712#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133679" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maddie2503"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="maddie2503" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555081">maddie2503</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 07:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one soooo much. People say it's basic but who cares. It's a bubble gummy floral. Not sickly sweet but has a candy like quality that brings it out of heady white floral territory. Long lasting too, I get 6-8 hours from this. Really beautiful.<br />
<br />
I do not smell the vanilla or cedar in the dry down. In fact this is a very linear fragrance to me, but I actually much prefer that because the initial spray is perfect. Love !!! I'm gonna be wearing this as main fragrance this spring / summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2133679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2133679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1751764">Lelena</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 05:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening of this perfume is unbearable for me but then it gets quite ok. So weird that all notes in it are my favorites and similar to my favorite perfumes’ notes yet this is such a flop for me. I blind bought it because I thought a perfume which has these notes in it cannot be bad which I made the same mistake with L’interdit OG as well. I also love the bottle design and the idea that design is giving with color palette yet definitely it is not what I was expecting. It kinda smells between  small makeup stores where there is perfumes mixed with make up powder scent and 90’s body sprays. It is definitely young and might be good starter perfume but don’t blind buy it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2129334"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2129334#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125581" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elyka21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996971"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1996971.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elyka21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-43297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain"title="Mon Guerlain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125581ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125581" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996971">Elyka21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 12:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't reach out for this one very often as it's not what I was expecting. I wish I could smell the bubblegum everyone is talking about, sadly I can't smell it. To my nose this is an overly green scent, quite sharp green scent, almost like when you would smell a freshly broken stem from the flower, a little too much for my senses, especially in the beginning...maybe because of the bergamot, not sure why. It dries down ok, generic but pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2125581"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2125581#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My skin brings out something very vegetal and green in this. It's very nauseating. Good to try first before buying. On the up side, it seems to wear soft.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2125396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2125396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123570" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Overall it's ok, a nice, fresh and bright feminine scent. Not mindblowing or particularly memorable to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2116232"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2116232#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116127" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
It gives candy and fruity vibe</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2116100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2116100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115401" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ziva99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ziva99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898768">Ziva99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 12:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample so I gave it a shot. <br />
So … THIS IS NOT MY WAY …<br />
<br />
Very fruity floral opening, way too much. <br />
I love orange blossoms and bergamots, but I think the middle note’s jasmine and tuberose are too dominant and eating the top notes. <br />
Also jasmine and tuberose are very artificial to my nose. <br />
<br />
Another Si, but more floral and fruitier without woodyness. Why is because I tried Si on my left wrist, My way on my right wrist then they were similar, but this one was more cloying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2115401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2115401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109797" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ThetideGoesWithme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2079008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ThetideGoesWithme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079008">ThetideGoesWithme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 09:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smell pleasant, easy to gift or blind buy. The initial mix of florals/vanilla/bergamot dries down to a grape soda smell however. Once you smell the grape it's hard to pick up anything else. <br />
<br />
The opening is very similar to Prada paradox and other perfumes from that year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2109797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2109797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2103349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2102002" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jeannebelmondo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/952157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.952157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jeannebelmondo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Tea-Escape-30261.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30261.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tea Escape"title="Tea Escape"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2102002ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2102002" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/952157">jeannebelmondo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-23">03/23/24 15:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Artificial grape Hi-Chew candy and funeral flowers. Pleasant and likeable but egregiously perfume-y</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2102002"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2102002#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101770" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GirlOnFire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="GirlOnFire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-Eau-de-Parfum-40069.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40069.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum"title="Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2101770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2101770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231923">GirlOnFire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-23">03/23/24 11:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually don’t hate My Way. I should state that I adore white florals, but the white florals I tend to go for tend to be creamy and kind of animalic. For instance, I love Robert Piguet’s Fracas, Robert Piguet’s Gardénia, Bond No. 9 Saks For Her, Madonna Truth or Dare, Givenchy Organza, Yves Rocher Monoi Eau de Vahinés. For anyone who says My Way smells very mature, I have to disagree. My Way is Gen Z white florals. It is very bubblegummy and grapey and sweet, different yet similar from the entire contemporary Givenchy l’Interdit collection. Like I said, I actually like this perfume but it’s not my usual style of white florals because it’s kind of high-strung and not very creamy. Sweet tarts candy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2101770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2101770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100112" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="000.rla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1711702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1711702.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="000.rla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/English-Pear-Freesia-10314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="English Pear & Freesia"title="English Pear & Freesia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1711702">000.rla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 19:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>bubblegum tuberose scent. a lot of ppl say its a old lady scent but it smells pretty young. if you cant stand white florals, stay away from this perfume. i however love white florals so this is my signature scent :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2100112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2100112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2099025" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2099025" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mrsgomez16"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995115"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mrsgomez16" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2099025ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2099025" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995115">mrsgomez16</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 21:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I will go ahead and say it, this is my MOST complimented scent I’ve ever worn. I already love it, but I think this scent creation loves me back. <br />
<br />
The dry down does something unique on my skin, and I can smell it all day. It’s a soft lingering sweetness/musky goodness  I wish I had better descriptions but something about the florals, with the woods + that pungent citrus in the top makes for a clean, sweet musky concoction for me! <br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
I have heard people state the lasting power isn’t good for them, which can happen for some! And others may state it’s on the “basic,” side. Before I smelled this, I had never known anything like it. I’m bias; I even wore it on my wedding day. Sentimental and beautiful! That’s how I can describe My Way! <br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
•Also, I own the floral flanker- I love it too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2099025"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2099025#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
