You have to like tuberose because they are the star of the show. This tuberose is bubble gummy, really sweet.<br />
<br />
You have to like sweet perfums to like this. It last for hours and has a good projection.<br />
<br />
It can be perfect as a signature perfum,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2094177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2094177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092012" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
 Would buy this for my girl any day of the week.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2092012"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2092012#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091880" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sassafras23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665184"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1665184.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sassafras23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Les-Parfums-Mythiques-Extravagance-d-Amarige-1973.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1973.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Les Parfums Mythiques - Extravagance d'Amarige"title="Les Parfums Mythiques - Extravagance d'Amarige"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665184">Sassafras23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 20:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s strange: there’s no fruit in this but the beginning smells fruity-tart. Would this be the citrus accord from the bergamot? But bergamot isn’t this sweet. Could this be that the fleur d’oranger gives off a fruity vibe? I’m not sure I’m noticing much evolution, but the fragrance remains clearly present. Tuberose comes forward in the latter parts. It’s a citrusy tuberose with a great staying power.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2091880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2091880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091314" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sabs1205"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640805.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sabs1205" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640805">sabs1205</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 09:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just had two nurses, one in their 20s and one in their 30s, ask me what perfume I was wearing today at the doctor’s office. The comment both ladies said to me at two different times were how “fresh” and “not artificially sweet” I smelled. That’s the perfect way I can describe the My Way line. I am absolutely drawn to the tuberose that has a bubblegum like appeal to it, without being juvenile. <br />
<br />
My Way is playful and lasts after three sprays for a good 8 hours on my skin, and clothes for a good day or two. Clearly, the sillage is phenomenal because both ladies could smell it at a decent distance, without being overwhelmed :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2091314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2091314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Both favorite notes.  Ideal for day time and spring summer.  A little lemon hint in the middle notes makes a very nice stand in my skin.  I like it very much</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2082433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2082433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081662" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CaroG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40850"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CaroG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-55805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40850">CaroG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 05:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really surprised at the comments on here saying this a fresh young perfume because to me this is an incredibly dated aggressive screechy flower bomb. For those who remember Sand and Sable from Coty in the 80s and early 90s... this is a dupe. I can't stand it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2081662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2081662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2080507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2080507" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yunitaridevianti"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1255825.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yunitaridevianti" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2080507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2080507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255825">yunitaridevianti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-02">03/02/24 21:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My very first reaction when it was freshly sprayed was “meh okay”. The smell was screechy, headache inducing potential. But once it gets to the middle note, I was like “wow 😍” smells flowery sweet. I agree someone says as feminine as it gets, girly young vibe type of feminine. It dries down to a creamy flowery vanilla type of scent. I love it. Some reviews say it smells generic, but honestly I’ve never smelled anyone like this around me, so I guess generic is relative. The top note is generic, though. But not the middle note. Fortunately the middle note last longer on me. This lasts until it’s washed on clothes, but only 4 hours on skin.<br />
<br />
It takes 1-2 hours to get to the middle note on fabric, so I usually spray it on clothes before I leave the house and spray it on my skin once I arrives at my destination.<br />
<br />
EDIT: Jeanne Arthes Pure Romantic and Police Potion Love for Her is such a good dupe for me that’s not a fan of My Way’s top note. I use the dupe on clothes and respray on skin with the real thing. The real thing still can’t be replaced though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2080507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2080507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073488" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073488" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elisabeth M."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17257"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.17257.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elisabeth M." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Musc-Ravageur-1801.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1801.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Ravageur"title="Musc Ravageur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); I'm turning 55 in May (still feeling young;-)) and I love the youthful and careless vibe of this scent. A keeper in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2073488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2073488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073169" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2067026"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2067026#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064281" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JDM3000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713865"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JDM3000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Rehab-50351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rehab"title="Rehab"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064281ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064281" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713865">JDM3000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is really similar to Prada paradox for me and even a little reminds me of Gucci Bloom. I much prefer the Gucci Bloom. The first few moments are surprisingly nice, soapy and clean, then it starts to get heavy into bubblegum tuberose, and withing about fifteen minutes it becomes sharp, indolic white floral, pretty screechy. It's not terrible, you wouldn't smell this on someone and think they stink, but its basic, and basic in a way that could be done better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060009" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dfnseven"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1937086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1937086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dfnseven" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1937086">dfnseven</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-12">02/12/24 09:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I used to HATE this perfume. It was a very annoying, sour, cloying synthetic junk to me and it smelt HORRIBLE until I got a whiff of this on my blonde friend. It was like a garden in heaven on her skin. Before you buy this just gotta make sure it works with your skin chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2060009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2060009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057537" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katiejon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656725"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.656725.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="katiejon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656725">katiejon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 15:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>03-08-24<br />
EDIT: I’m putting the brakes on the previous review because (durp) my sample that I reviewed below was actually the My Way “Parfum”. I’m leaving it because... it’s swoon-worthy and I think if my description sounds up your alley... go sniff the Parfum flanker. I have ordered a full bottle of My Way Parfum and a small bottle of the OG... I’ll update this review when I wear my OG a few times.<br />
<br />
<br />
02-09-24<br />
I LOVE this fragrance!<br />
It is simple, light and beautiful!<br />
When I first spray it smells like an effervescent fountain Dr. Pepper.<br />
The dry down is like a memory of sun-warmed woods.<br />
To me, this is outstanding in its mastery of simplistic elegance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2057537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2057537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055934" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2055934" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yogamomny17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167275"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1167275.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yogamomny17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2055934ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2055934" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167275">Yogamomny17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 07:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried this on in ULTA yesterday because when I sniffed it from the bottle it gave me a very nostalgic feeling. I knew I had smelled this before  and it was giving me the sensation of fond memories that just wouldn’t break the surface. <br />
<br />
I sprayed it on my skin and my clothes and went about my evening. <br />
<br />
This morning I returned to my shirt to smell and test for the longevity and it hit me. This smells  exactly like the Sand &amp; Sable perfume my mom would sometimes wear back in the 80s.<br />
<br />
It’s almost identical to the original 80s formula at least ifmy nose remembers correctly and it makes sense because the note list is nearly identical as well.<br />
<br />
It was very loud very white floral unapologetically in your face but it to me was clean floral feminine and had a slight creamy almost tropical vibe. Back  then it was a comfort scent because it was my moms fragrance but now it’s just to much although I can totally see why some  love it.<br />
<br />
They still offer Sand &amp; Sable at a much cheaper price point although I’m sure it’s probably a watered down version by now. <br />
<br />
Even without smelling todays version I know most of the old 80s powerhouse drugstore offerings from houses like Coty are a far and muted cry from what they once were but if you like the idea of spending less for the same vibe or actually want this in a possibly toned down version it’s probably worth a try. <br />
<br />
You  can find bottles of Sand &amp; Sable on eBay for around 20 bucks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2055934"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2055934#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is in my opinion as feminine as feminine gets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2049567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2049567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048578" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270046">scissorhandedly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 02:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eh... this scent profile would generally be something I enjoy, but it has a sour aspect which I don't think is that pretty and when I take a deep breath, I'm actually getting cat pee. It smells okay in the air.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2048578"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2048578#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821206">igalmusic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-26">01/26/24 22:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is nothing bubblegumy about this scent, I really don't get the bellow reviews.This fragrance is very feminine, not too sweet, not too floral just perfectly balanced. Probably the most feminine perfume out there, I absolutely love it! Lasts a very long time as well. Perfect signature scent 👌 If you are not a fun of floral perfumes stay away from My Way. Opening is very juicy and fresh, thanks to the orange blossom, then creamy tuberose makes this perfume more smooth, base is just divine, blend of musk and wood, so sexy! All year round perfume, great for every occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2043201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2043201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1982468">Anmaliwa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 00:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had to get used to this one. It is very heavy sweet, bubblegum and a bit almost like fresh picked lily of the valley. The first 2 weeks I could only wear a small spray on the wrist, but yesterday and today I sprayed it on me. I would say that this is a spring perfume for someone younger than 30. On my skin it lasts 6-8 hours. On textile and paper it stays a couple of weeks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2040233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2040233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035587" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033259" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thewho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857053"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1857053.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thewho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033259ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033259" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857053">thewho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 22:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SOTD My Way by Armani 3/5<br />
<br />
First spray is sweet and pleasant with a fruity tinge. Sweet and tart. After a few minutes the tartness fades to a sweet white floral. I’m not getting a lot of tuberose in the dry down, more of the jasmin. <br />
<br />
It’s a like but not enough to purchase a decant or full bottle. <br />
<br />
Reviewed is based on a free sample from Nordstrom. Wore at home.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2033259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2033259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2028752" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Runskihike"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1969564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Runskihike" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ellis-Brooklyn/Salt-60584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Salt"title="Salt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2028752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2028752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1969564">Runskihike</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 08:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my bridal perfume, and I keep it around for special date nights and special occasions. It is very sugary on me, so I do have to be in the mood for it, it can become a little cloying if sprayed too heavily! I feel that it starts off very cotton candy/bubble gum, but the florals really stand out on the dry-down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2028752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2028752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027956" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FeleciaB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410145"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1410145.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FeleciaB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410145">FeleciaB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 13:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like sweet tarts and flowers. First time I smelled it I wasn't so sure what I thought of it. Second time I like it more but it's still not a love. It would get worn though if someone bought me it so there's that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2027956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2027956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027942" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027942" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jadepo21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289078"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1289078.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jadepo21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Lust-in-Paradise-53588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lust in Paradise"title="Lust in Paradise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027942ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027942" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289078">jadepo21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 12:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can’t agree with comments about its sweetness because I truly do not detect sweet or sugary notes. It is, however, a lovely white floral. I am typically someone who despises most white floral scents because they easily start to smell like a funeral home and often give me headaches. I have found almost every white floral I do enjoy has tuberose and/or jasmine. And the combo here is excellent. It mellows out that mature and dominating quality of the flowers and paired with the vanilla and cedar, I have to say it is quite delicate and wearable. It manages to be a youthful white floral. Now, is it groundbreaking and unique? No. But when did we decide that a good fragrance had to break barriers? It’s beautiful. Enjoy it for what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2027942"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2027942#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027637" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1388467">JoobMoos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this one, love the bottle, (especially the Nacre version) and fantasize about wearing this in Winter…HOWEVER I feel like it’s missing something. I feel like it needs more of a tart or sparkling element. This nagging feeling almost makes it distracting to wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2027637"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2027637#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448371">blackcat02</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-10">01/10/24 17:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this again today after a long time and I have different thoughts than before. I no longer get a in-your-face overwhelming cheap hubba bubba bubblegum smell. While still very sweet, It’s so much more floral (heavy white florals). But I can predict this becoming bothersome after a while. I put on a sample of this less than an hour ago and it’s already starting to give me a slight headache. It’s strong and maybe too noticeable for my taste. It’s nice in small doses. If I hadn’t over sprayed I think this would be a solid 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2027041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2027041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melanii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1964893"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1964893.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melanii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1964893">Melanii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 14:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The smell of this perfume is feminine and playful, something a young woman would wear but in my opinion is headache-inducing. I tried my best to like it but the scent was too intense. The white flowers dominate above all the notes and it is too strong. This is one of the few perfumes that has given me this reaction. I think people like it more on me than I do on myself. It's a shame since the bottle is elegant and feminine. I wouldn't repurchase this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2024655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2024655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells like candied flower petals but also has a fresh breezey quality to it. The opening is somewhat bright but then dries down to a sugary sweet finish. Great scent for spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2023534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2023534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020162" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tiny_bean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1950100.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tiny_bean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020162ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020162" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950100">Tiny_bean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 11:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this on myself today in a store and I will not be buying this. Ugh. So generic and I just get like a sort of sweet citrus smell from it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2020162"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2020162#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020157" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jessica3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jessica3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020157ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020157" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); However, it fades incredibly fast leaving the initial beauty pretty much undetectable. Which really stinks. If your body chemistry allows - you could easily pull this off any time of year, day or night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2020157"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2020157#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
