I mean, it's good that taxis smell like something other than just humanity, but why would anyone want to smell like a taxi?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2014152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2014152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nruthh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318176"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1318176.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nruthh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Rosie-Jane/Rosie-52177.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52177.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rosie"title="Rosie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318176">nruthh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 19:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the only perfume I’ve ever rated as a hate on here. This is repulsive to me. The huge, screechy citrus and white florals are suffocating — I love tuberose, but this feels like a cheap, terrible imitation of something like Fracas. This is one of the worst perfumes I have ever smelled. The bottle looks cheap (what is that MLM-vibe font?), and the juice is worse. I’m literally still nauseous and I’ve been trying to scrub it off for over 20 minutes. I cannot emphasize enough how this is nauseating. Bubblegum in the sun, screechy citrus — not good citrus — and cheap, powdery, milky white flowers. Ugh, what a dud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2012642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2012642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012018" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012018" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nonelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nonelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-instant-Magic-Eau-de-Parfum-67311.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67311.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'instant Magic Eau de Parfum"title="L'instant Magic Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012018ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012018" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528404">nonelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have every kind of L'Interdit, so tuberose and white flowers are obviously my favourites, but I don't like Armani My Way. This is sickly sweet and has a note of pink bubblegum or cotton candy. If L'interdit is too mature or formal for you, I would recommend trying My Way instead. Not my cup of tea, but I get why people love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2012018"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2012018#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010915" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010915" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="olfactorie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434371"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="olfactorie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010915ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010915" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434371">olfactorie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-26">12/26/23 07:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know why the reviews on this are so bad, this is a very nice day time scent that gets me compliments from everyone. I wore it during this summer and it was the only perfume that didn't make me sick during my stay at the Adriatic coast. I wore it during my Christmas office party and people asked what do I use... I wouldn't say it's generic,  screechy or cheap</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2010915"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2010915#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010844" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Seattle Dweller"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984642"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.984642.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Seattle Dweller" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abercrombie-Fitch/Fierce-3508.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3508.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fierce"title="Fierce"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984642">Seattle Dweller</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-26">12/26/23 05:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful Fragrance. 💕<br />
Interesting how early reviews praise the blended nuances.<br />
<br />
⚠️ ...then 3 years after it's initial release girls start buying <b>cheap fakes and knock-offs</b> that flooded eBay and the decant market, this Armani MY WAY fragrance becomes:<br />
<br />
 <i> "screechy and cheap smelling"</i><br />
<br />
Poor Armani 😔</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2010844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2010844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010534" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010534" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colorblindlove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="colorblindlove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010534ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010534" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106293">colorblindlove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-25">12/25/23 17:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m sorry but this is vile!! Its literally the definition of grandma perfume in the worst way. Very sharp, screechy white floral scent and its STRONG! I havent disliked a scent this much since thierry mugler’s angel &amp; womanity 🤢</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2010534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2010534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2003684" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UlianaM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1910998"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1910998.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UlianaM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Tonka-Cola-76893.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76893.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka Cola"title="Tonka Cola"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2003684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2003684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1910998">UlianaM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-17">12/17/23 12:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>update 05/30/2024<br />
I actually like it. A designer scent, but good silage and projection and smells really nice, but my partner hates it. He hated it back there in November/ December last year and today when I put it on he immediately spot it and said exactly the same what he said then "smells awful to me."<br />
Well, doesn't look like I am getting a bigger bottle -_-<br />
<br />
It's ok. I can say I like it , but this smell reminds me of 100 of other smells in the market and although this one is quite intense.<br />
This is a trendy, not revolutionary scent. <br />
<br />
What I notice in most of the 'pop' scents - I can always smell shampoo :)<br />
<br />
It's NOT bad. It's quite nice. White flowers, jasmine. Sweet, but with a little fresh shade (which I would identify as citrusy). <br />
<br />
The projection is huge, so it's critical not to overspray. This types of scents envelope everything and everybody arounds you. If you overspray, you can get a headache. And as  Anniemal said below: this type of scents-if you use too much- may cause people to complain. It's not just you, who gonna be in the cocoon of the scent, but it's also super diffusive. <br />
<br />
As for me, I'd say this scent is problematic to use: one spray gives me 75% of what I expect. So if I make two, I am 50% oversprayed. And with the fragrances like this, it's critical: people literally cannot stay in one room with you.<br />
And if to make 1 spray, it feels a little 'undersprayed.' better than over, for sure, but makes me feel I didn't get what I wanted :(<br />
<br />
p.s. when writing a review on Flowerbomb, I realized I'd actually choose Flowerbomb. Both flowers, but completely different and the flowerbomb smells more interesting and expensive to me (no shampoo)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2003684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2003684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002318" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="annafaerie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1504463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="annafaerie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504463">annafaerie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-15">12/15/23 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you love a scandalous, unique, avant garde, niche scent, skip. Some of us’ first “big girl” perfume was Daisy. This is for us.<br />
<br />
I like to smell like a flower fairy. I think about Victor Hugo describing Cosette as having a “condensation of April, and of dew” and want to embody that. I love tuberose. The tuberose here is juicy like the fruity hi-chew candy. It’s not a “conservative” white floral, it’s a youthful, sweet white floral. <br />
<br />
This is the ingenue running barefoot through the citrus trees and flowers, this is the Disney Princess “I want more” song, this is what I imagined Ophelia was like before Hamlet broke her heart. If you’re like me and you think “if I was a fairy that flower would be my dress”, if your favorite season is spring, or if you loved sour candy growing up, this might be worth trying. I love her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2002318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2002318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2000718" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Anniemal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1926088"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Anniemal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2000718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2000718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1926088">Anniemal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-13">12/13/23 21:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hated this. It projects super well, but to me it smelled sickly sweet and floral. I was honestly a little embarrassed because it’s the type of scent people would complain about in public. This gave me a head ache. If you like sweet floral perfumes without a lot of layers, this would be great for you since it’s got lasting power.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="2000718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=2000718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; More power to them!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1995504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1995504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994723" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thaochipnd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1579302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thaochipnd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chloe/Jasminum-Sambac-57248.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57248.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasminum Sambac"title="Jasminum Sambac"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994723ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994723" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988035" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katiesimpsonhair"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/497242"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.497242.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="katiesimpsonhair" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chloe/Nomade-Jasmin-Naturel-Intense-79230.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79230.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nomade Jasmin Naturel Intense"title="Nomade Jasmin Naturel Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/497242">katiesimpsonhair</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very pretty. I get lots of Jasmin very similar to the the natural jasmine I could smell when I went to Tunisia on Holliday. This is so lovely, the base gives me the bourbon vanilla smell you get in Donna Born in Roma, which I love. So wonderful you can refill your bottle too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1988035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1988035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987608" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MareaCamacho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452120"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1452120.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MareaCamacho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Profumum-Roma/Gioiosa-88999.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88999.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gioiosa"title="Gioiosa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987608ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987608" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452120">MareaCamacho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-28">11/28/23 16:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is not as heavy on the tuberose drydown as the intense. Therefore I prefer this one better. The Eau de Parfum original. <br />
<br />
If you don't like tuberose at all and have bad memories associated with that note - you could fall in love with this one. It's nice on its own. It's delicious paired with bianco lattes body lotion, a spritz of psychedelic love and a cloud of hypnotic poison edt. So I'll use my bottle up with these products..and thats the beauty of layering. Anyway- . Still deciding if it's a repurchase or not but I appreciate this for what it gives. It's really nice- a little boring for most,  maybe, but then again it's such a vibe when you're in the mood. Happy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1987608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1987608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987155" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kinga.s.r."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1862796.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kinga.s.r." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987155ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987155" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862796">kinga.s.r.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-28">11/28/23 05:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smell candies here. And who doesn't like candies? It's a pretty scent, but after watching the "My Way" commercial (I reccomend watching it on YT - it's fantastic!) I expected so much more. The model from the commercial is traveling around Asia (at least that's how it looks like) and she seems so excited about exploring new places, scents, people. In other worlds, great adventure, filled with joy and bringing unforgettable memories. Unfortunately, My Way doesn't give me these vibes at all, being just another orange blossom &amp; vanilla fragrance, with very poor longevity and cloying tendencies. Such a pity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1987155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1987155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1986904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MareaCamacho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452120"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1452120.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MareaCamacho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Profumum-Roma/Gioiosa-88999.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88999.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gioiosa"title="Gioiosa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1986904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1986904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452120">MareaCamacho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-27">11/27/23 20:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely a mood lifter for me.<br />
<br />
There are similar scent profiles for this imo such as  Kate Spade and or prada paradoxe ..while they may be giving the same fruity vibe, they are much more sharper and this one is amazingly creamier and milky. Kate Spade, prada paradoxe  are like concentrated sugary jammy slow dripping syrup and this one is as if we took that syrup and gently swirl in into a floral milk tea. There is a delicious milky tuberose in here that does not go into hubba Bubba bubblegum territory (looking at you my way intense)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1986904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1986904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985112" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="QueOndaGuera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1827142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="QueOndaGuera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Sweetly-Known-64644.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64644.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweetly Known"title="Sweetly Known"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827142">QueOndaGuera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 13:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this fragrance and I am NOT a white floral person. However this is blended so well with the bergamot that I don’t feel drowned in floral air freshener. On me the orange blossom starts out so strong but it is sweet and beautiful so I don’t mind (I can see this bothering someone else though. It is super sweet). The dry down mellows out to mostly tube rose with the bergamot staying strong on my skin. I don’t detect vanilla which is weird to me? And the jasmine is hard to detect with the tuberose but that isn’t bad IMO so many fragrances these days are jasmine heavy. Overall I love this for springtime but I might wear it year round because it’s just happy and uplifting for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1985112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1985112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985044" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985044" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CozyLove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1905192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CozyLove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985044ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985044" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905192">CozyLove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The smell of the perfume reminds me of a middle aged woman. It's not that bad but it's definitely not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1985044"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1985044#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1984094" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="whodoesyourtaxes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1679306"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1679306.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="whodoesyourtaxes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Lavender-Martini-7717.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7717.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lavender Martini"title="Lavender Martini"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1984094ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1984094" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1679306">whodoesyourtaxes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-24">11/24/23 08:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I feel like my nose is broken reading some of these reviews lol, you guys are getting fruity notes?? To me this reads as 100% floral, very jasmine-heavy. It's a little bit stuffy, and very mature-- I'm not getting the "girly" description that so many are using. To me it borders on what some would classify as a "grandma" scent. I don't hate it, but it's not something I would ever wear.<br />
<br />
edit: turns out I actually do hate this lol. got a whiff of the tester I left in my room and... yeah. just not at all for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1984094"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1984094#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980964" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sabs1205"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640805.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sabs1205" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640805">sabs1205</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 08:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Words cannot describe the love I have for both My Way and My Way Intense perfumes. I’ve always loved perfumes with notes of tuberose, and I find the way Armani created My Way and the intense version just intoxicating, in all the right ways.<br />
<br />
My Way is slightly more “delicate”, where the bergamot and tuberose are beautifully prominent. The vanilla notes and musk perfectly settle on my skin and clothing with the tuberose, creating a warm sensation of sweetness, freshness, and calmness. The longevity is so long lasting, just like the original, and I get a perfect whiff every time I move. Both My Way and My Way Intense last on my skin for the entire day. When I first discovered these amazing perfumes, I sprayed them on my sweatshirt, and smelled both after two days. <br />
<br />
If you want a slightly richer vibe, grab the My Way Intense. If you want a slightly more delicate vibe, grab the original My Way. Personally, I would wear both all year round, day and night. The price range is high, as expected for a designer perfume, and understandable for the quality of the incredible performance given. For all tuberose, white flower, and vanilla lovers, I highly suggest you try these! I have found my new signature scents!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1980964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1980964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980315" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Boba2908"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1808593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Boba2908" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Hypnotic-Poison-219.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.219.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Poison"title="Hypnotic Poison"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980315ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980315" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1808593">Boba2908</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-19">11/19/23 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my most recent additions to my collection. To be honest, I always overlooked this bottle after testing it once and disliking it. It gave me a headache and I remember a "lingering" sensation. However, a year later, I tested it again and fell in love with it ! It is the most feminine, classy and Spring scent ever! Personally, it works for a day and night fragrance. It does not smell generic. For me, I get the the smell of the orange blossom instantly, then the tuberose and vanilla at the dry down. It does, after 4-6 hours, sit close to the skin. But, it does not fade away. I sprayed it on my t-shirt and I could still smell it the next day. Would I purchase another bottle? No, but it definitely is a fun fragrance to wear but I do see how it could get quite boring after a while. Buy a tester or the 30ml if you can!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1980315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1980315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1978213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1978213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1977731" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samaracopernicus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1893996"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1893996.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samaracopernicus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1977731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1977731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); It is also extremely sweet. Not suited to my taste so I'm glad it was only a free sample.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1977731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1977731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1977333" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FlowerSeeker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1777192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FlowerSeeker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Magnifique-3746.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3746.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magnifique"title="Magnifique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1977333ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1977333" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); In mid-dry it’s a little bitter for me but before and after that it’s fresh and floral and feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1977333"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1977333#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972328" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rosiewebber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rosiewebber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480732">Rosiewebber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-09">11/09/23 03:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love at first sniff. Warm but fresh, sweet but spicy, white flowers and vanilla woods. Very feminine, very pretty. I’m not bothered if others find it generic, I think it’s lovely. Seems to perform well enough too. <br />
<br />
If you’re wanting to try it but don’t want to spend that much, one of the So…? Unique body sprays is identical to this (I know because I had that first and loved it), it’s the White Blossom one (NOT White Floral, which is the one listed in the database here, white blossom isn’t listed for some reason).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I get violet notes. It may be the turbose and cedar though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1969375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1969375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1969007" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1969007" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1969007ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1969007" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-05">11/05/23 03:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received a 15 ml of this from a recent Armani website order but I wouldn’t pay money for a full bottle of it. It’s a very beautiful, feminine, sweet tuberose but not worth the high price. <br />
<br />
It’s just too simple and linear, bubblegum tuberose with vanilla base. That is what I get from all the notes listed. <br />
<br />
Also I find it very mediocre as performance. Needs serious overspraying because after about three hours I can’t even smell it on me. <br />
<br />
Skip this and get the Intense version or Givenchy I’Interdit. Both of these smell more complex and are longer lasting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1969007"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1969007#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1968008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1477152">KatelynMLovesPerfume</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-03">11/03/23 16:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'll start by saying I think this is a great fragrance and I can understand the hype and why people love it. But of course fragrance is so broad and is different for everyone. I thought looking at the notes I would love the scent because I've been on a white floral kick as of recent. And I heard it's like bubblegum, so I was like ok this sounds up my alley. I tested it out at the mall and sprayed myself with this and I must say this has great lasting power lol.. However I could not get over how sneezy pollenated &amp; strong the tuberose was. It wasn't a fresh tuberose it is cloying &amp; makes me feel like I need to sneeze. It completely took over the fragrance and mixed with the bubble gum sweet scent wasn't my favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1968008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1968008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1967280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; To be completely honest, I like the Zara perfume better. The dupe is a bit more fruity/floral while stile staying fresh and classy. I will wear them both and see how they each last on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1967280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1967280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847602">krissiekat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-25">10/25/23 07:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i loved this for a while and used up 4/5 of the bottle, but suddenly i one day just didnt like it anymore. in fact i even started disliking it. it smells like synthetic grape candy, strong but not fresh. it's too harsh and not well rounded, and i find myself reacting negatively when other people wear it. its so strong!! i sat next to a woman who wore it in class and i found myself being distracted by the unpleasant smell. now i feel bad for the people who were around me when i used to wear it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
