padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1871848">MTK82</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-22">10/22/23 14:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a beautiful bottle!! Too bad it smells so acidic! I really don't get the hype...I got a sample to test it and I git a headache! It starts off as really sharp and unpleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1958403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1958403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1957972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1957972" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="laila26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1860640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="laila26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Hibiscus-73796.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73796.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hibiscus"title="Hibiscus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1957972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1957972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860640">laila26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-21">10/21/23 22:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore this all day every day for like a year. I still love it, but I'm trying to change things up. I think this one does a great job of not being too heavy, or "sickly sweet", like it's pleasant without being overpowering. My mom likes this one too, which is very rare because most perfumes give her headaches, and this one did not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1957972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1957972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1956692" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1956692" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AUyliong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1859277.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AUyliong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1956692ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1956692" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859277">AUyliong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-20">10/20/23 07:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is very nutty. Or is that raw unprocessed vanilla? I can't tell. I know I've smelt this opening scent before in a snack food product. Sweet corn chips?<br />
<br />
After about 20 mins the scent has become sweeter as the nuttiness has started to dissipate. <br />
<br />
An hour in the sweet slightly nutty smell is still there. I'm guessing that's the Indian Jasmine, Tuberose and White Musk working off of one another. So far so linear. <br />
<br />
An hour and a half in everything has significantly mellowed down. There's no more nuttiness. The flowers have quieted down. It's now a skin scent. <br />
<br />
I'm thinking this is unisex. Not even feminine leaning. A guy could rock this.<br />
<br />
Almost 2 hrs in it's so mellow it's almost aquatic.<br />
<br />
2hrs 15 mins in I'm detecting orange. This late into the game? It definitely smells like orange skin with some greens around it. Like a leafy orange.<br />
<br />
3 hrs in the orange has become more pronounced. It's unmistakable. That's orange...or bergamot. Either way it's a citrus. It's nice they loaded the citrus towards the back because citrus scents are usually very fleeting and easily carried off by the wind.<br />
<br />
4.5 hrs in scent is down to the bone. It probably won't last past hour 5. That's on skin of course. May last longer on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1956692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1956692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1955349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amourdelarose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1045965"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1045965.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amourdelarose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Dubai-Jade-41012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dubai Jade"title="Dubai Jade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1955349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1955349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1045965">amourdelarose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-18">10/18/23 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is gorgeous. Simply mouthwatering. I would never have guessed the notes listed above: I get all grape candy &amp; bubblegum with a bit of heady white florals. How can a fragrance so sweet and fruity smell so elegant, calm and composed? Such joy in a bottle. I would definitely test it first tho as the perception of this perfume is so dividing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1955349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1955349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1953919" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="francesco_grieco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1763409.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="francesco_grieco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1953919ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1953919" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763409">francesco_grieco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 02:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My Way by Giorgio Armani is a fragrance that leans towards the generic and conventionally feminine. While it lacks a distinctive personality, it offers a pleasant, inoffensive scent suitable for the office. This fragrance could serve as a decent first fragrance, a gift, or a blind purchase, thanks to its overall agreeable nature.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1953919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1953919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196389">turkishgirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-17">07/17/20 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>how people can vote on the longevity and sillage if they did not tried it yet???? fragrantica should do something this is ridiculous...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1200738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1200738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1647835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1647835" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Naqwalan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552504"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1552504.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Naqwalan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1647835ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1647835" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552504">Naqwalan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-18">09/18/22 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume gets so much hate, but I love it exactly because it's so playful, girly and unpretentious. Gets compliments from everyone. Amazing performance while being airy at the same time. Serves as a reminder that not everything in life needs to be complex. If you can think past the judgemental attitude of 'I need to be special and different from all humans around me' you might really enjoy this. It's delicious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1647835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1647835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1322390" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1322390" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alliesunshine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1307041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alliesunshine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Si-Fiori-53243.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53243.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sì Fiori"title="Sì Fiori"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1322390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1322390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307041">alliesunshine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-09">04/09/21 09:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok the reviewers who are calling this perfume ‘basic’ and ‘not groundbreaking’ are just so dramatic?? There are so many other perfumes I’ve tried that are so similar to eachother and extremely popular. This one is one of the ones that smells the least like others? Actually, it smells so close to L’interdit however for some reason that perfume is praised to the gods? Anyway.. this perfume is beautiful! The tuberose and orange blossom, much like in L’interdit, translate to a grapey accord. However, unlike L’interdit, the combination of bergamot and orange blossom do add a little citrus note in here that in my opinion balances the fragrance a lot better and also gives its a brighter happier feel! Some reviewers have noted they smell a red berry, perhaps strawberry, and although that isn’t listed I do get that just a tiny bit. Maybe I wouldn’t have picked up on that had I not read about it. I almost get an orange creamsicle vibe from this! It’s really pleasant, and between this and L’interdit I prefer My Way because of its brightness and sparkle! Also that bottle.... it’s just beautiful. One thing that was holding me back are the bad reviews on this one that frankly I think are silly. While I believe, obviosuly, not everyone is going to like the fragrance, I just can’t get behind these ‘basic’ ‘generic’ ‘not ground breaking’ statements! <br />
<br />
My Way is bright and gleaming and more unique than most designer fragrances. <br />
<br />
<br />
Cheers!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1322390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1322390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1218924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1218924" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/899874"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.899874.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/Cashmere-Palo-Santo-90134.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90134.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cashmere & Palo Santo"title="Cashmere & Palo Santo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1218924ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1218924" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/899874">alit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-01">09/01/20 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm team "unimpressed" with My Way. Boring, uninspired, yet another sweetened fruity-white floral designer scent. If you like Idole Lancome or Givenchy Irresistible - this is likely up your alley, although of these three I'd probably pick Irresistible--it has a tad more character in this bunch of fruity floral syrupy mass appealing scents. At least Irresistible has more distinct drydown. But back to My Way:<br />
 1. The name is stupid. It evokes Frank Sinatra allusion but in reality there is no glamour, no spicy danger, no lavish parties vibe, just... another nice scent that you would never remember had it not been for the Armani name on it.<br />
 2. I would wear this on days when I just don't know what I want to wear, just something pleasant and feminine.<br />
3. It opens up great: juicy fruity bubble gum, almost red currant-raspberry like, but this quickly fades to sweetened pear and vanilla and nice orange blossom and tuberose. Nice, just not nice enough for this beautiful bottle. (the bottle with this cap is indeed gorgoeus). <br />
4. It would easily appeal to almost everyone young or mature, so this is the main trap: it would be a safe gift and will probably end up with a few flankers. But this versatility is what kills the cat, it lacks character and whatever idea there was behind this, is drowned in the goal to make this a bestseller. If they amped up the woodsy notes (totally undetectable to my nose) or if there was some patchouli I feel like it could have been way, WAY more nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1218924"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1218924#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1463219" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1463219" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tonetone824"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1423422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tonetone824" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1463219ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1463219" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423422">Tonetone824</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-14">12/14/21 09:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Man’s perspective here. I actually got this scent as a sample when I bought a bottle of Armani Stronger With You just because I had to choose two samples of something. It smelled so good I bought a bottle for my sister and girlfriend who both loved it as well<br />
<br />
Highly recommend this scent for a woman. Very attractive floral fragrance that will get you compliments and turn heads. This is my favorite scent on a woman so far that I’ve smelled just above Dior J’adore and this is cheaper.<br />
<br />
If you care more about smelling good than smelling “unique” or edgy like the snobby YouTube fragrance reviewers, you’ll probably like it. It’s simple, but it smells fantastic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1463219"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1463219#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="62036" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

I have smelled many “unique” perfumes, but whats the point of them? padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1236241">ladypicky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-02">09/02/20 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been experimenting with couple of My way's testers and oh girl! I Don't like it.The bottle is so pretty but the scent is synthetic and cheap to my nose.It is sweet and floral and very boring,I don't get any white musk.It's a boring orange blossom scent.sits close to the skin and projection is mild.Lasting power about 3 hours on me.<br />
on the drydown there is a sournrss of Delina PDM vibe.<br />
#ladylovesperfumes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1219339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1219339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1215342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1215342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katsong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/443791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.443791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="katsong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Intense-2011-13016.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13016.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Intense 2011"title="Dior Homme Intense 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1215342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1215342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/443791">katsong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-23">08/23/20 21:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a much more toned down version of a bubble-gum tuberose scent.  It's more sheer, has a fruity "pear or citrus" quality added to it, and not as cloying or powdery from other iterations of this combination.  It's sweetened as well, which is good because if it was sharper it could smell like hairspray.  The projection is enormous!  It will waft through the air.  5/10 for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1215342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1215342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1202267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1202267" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Neemat Al Ayoubi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007883"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1007883.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Neemat Al Ayoubi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-est-Belle-L-Elixir-95856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie est Belle L'Elixir"title="La Vie est Belle L'Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1202267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1202267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007883">Neemat Al Ayoubi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-21">07/21/20 14:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample.. I wanted to love this one because I like GA and Carlos Benaim but i was disappointed, all I get is sweet artificial Jasmin.. Honestly nothing special, just another "meh" perfume in a beautiful bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1202267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1202267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1216594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1216594" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BettinaFox"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1108734"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1108734.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BettinaFox" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/LPDO/Bois-Intense-59634.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59634.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois Intense"title="Bois Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1216594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1216594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1108734">BettinaFox</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-26">08/26/20 23:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another generic and boring sweet floral fruity that the market wouldn't even miss if it had never been released. It's worse than I expected. I'm wondering when perfume houses will start creating exciting and unique scents again, scents they once used to.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="62036"comment_id="1216594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html?ccid=1216594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="62036" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x600" id="fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1" v-pre>

                <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
    
</div>
    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">23.&nbsp;</span>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
